    • setCurrentBadge

      public void setCurrentBadge​(javax.swing.ImageIcon badgeIcon, java.awt.Color modeColor, java.lang.String wordGuessed)
      setter for the current badge
      Parameters:
      badgeIcon - sets the screenshot of current image drawn on the canvas
      modeColor - sets the color of the turn
      wordGuessed - sets the word that was guessed also adds the badge to a list so it can later display all badges

      Addes new badge to list
      Parameters:
      currI - current image of badge
      currC - current color of badge frame
      currW - current word guessed
